description:
After the identity was revealed, Yunxi quarreled with the family because they did not keep their promises. The angry Qian Aotian wanted to punish this unfilial daughter. It happened that the Prince of Ye arrived to stop it. With this opportunity, Yunxi wants to take Que`er and Auntie Xue with her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Domineering Prince of Ye, save his wife online
